source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_000<tab>Well, paint me yellow and call me a chocobo─that's Millith's sightseeing log you've got there!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_000<tab>あんたが持っているソレは……。
もしかして、ミリスの「探検手帳」じゃないか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_001<tab>Ahem. Forgive me─I got carried away for a moment. I am Kester Ironheart, cousin to Millith and an explorer of sorts, like most of my extended family.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_001<tab>……そうか、あんたのことはミリスから聞いてるぜ。
俺は、ケスター・アイアンハート。
ミリスの従兄で、探検家だ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_002<tab>When I last spoke with Millith, she told me of an adventurer with a keen case of wanderlust─an adventurer that I know now to be you. What say you lend me your log for a moment? Don't worry─I won't eat it or anything.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_002<tab>ミリスが探検の手ほどきをしたっていうのなら、
俺も協力しないわけにはいかないな。
……どれ、あんたの「探検手帳」を貸してみてくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_003<tab>There, there, and yes─there! That should do it, I reckon.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_003<tab>ちょちょいっと、こうして……。
よし、これで完成だ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_004<tab>It's no secret that Ishgard is home to some of the most remarkable sights in our realm. Mind you, I've not seen them all myself, but I certainly know where they might be found. And now, so do you─thanks to the notes and rumors I've seen fit to jot down in your sightseeing log.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_004<tab>あんたの「探検手帳」に、項目を追加しといたぜ。
ついでに、俺がこの辺りで集めた、
名所や秘境の情報、噂話の類いまで書いておいた。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_005<tab>Yes, scores of stunning vistas are just waiting to be discovered. Your legs will not carry you to all of them, though. Should you find a particular spot out of reach, you might consider taking to the skies atop a black-feathered bird.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_005<tab>ただ、俺が仕入れた情報の中には、
とても人の足だけじゃ、到達できそうにねえ場所もある。
黒チョコボやら何やらを、駆使する必要があるってことだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_007<tab>...Oho, but if I were to say more, I would be robbing you of the joy of discovering these spectacular views for yourself. Godsspeed, my fellow explorer, and may this moment mark the beginning of a tour of wonder!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_007<tab>……っと、これ以上の助言は野暮ってもんか。
さあ、情報を頼りに、さらなる探検を楽しんでくれ。
そして、その「探検手帳」に新しい「今」を記録してこい！

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>Heavensward entries have been added to your sightseeing log!
target: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>「探検手帳」に「蒼天編」の項目が追加されました！

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>You must be level 50 or above to record Heavensward vistas. Travel to the location indicated and fulfill the necessary conditions and you will complete the entry for that vista, earning experience points in the process.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>「蒼天編」は、レベル50以上の全てのクラス・ジョブで、
目的地の条件を達成することができ、
達成時には、経験値を獲得することができます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Use your wits and the notes provided by Kester to identify these stunning sights and the proper way to appreciate them, and see Ishgard as only the greatest explorers have seen her!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>かぎられた情報から、該当する場所や諸条件を予測し、
新たな項目を埋めていきましょう！

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_020<tab>Many are the wondrous sights to behold in these lands, but the going is parlous indeed. Would that I were more accomplished in the martial disciplines, that I might see all there is to be seen...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_KESTERIRONHEART_000_020<tab>俺は探検家をやってるんだが、
この辺りは、少しの油断が命取りになる危険な場所だ。
戦闘の経験を積んでいないと、おちおち探検もできないぜ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of War or Magic.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNY807_02107_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>本クエストを進行するためには、
現在のクラス・ジョブが、
ファイター、もしくはソーサラーである必要があります。
